title: How is it
body: How is it that this game is as big as it is and they give out thousands of $ of prize money yet it takes 2 + days to get a response on a support ticket for something as simple as not receiving an email for your password reset like seriously and anything else its so aggravating cause some people only have limited time that they are able to play and then it is postponed even longer due to support issues ............. end rant #aggravated

replies.body:
We're normally much more swift with getting back to players in support tickets, but lately, we've been pretty swamped with tickets. Because of this, there's an abnormal delay in getting back to everyone, but I can assure you that our specialists are working their butts off. 

I hope this clears up what's going on, please let me know if you have any questions.
